did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Morley, S. Griswold (Sylvanus Griswold). Postcard collection,

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

did.abstract: Morley traveled extensively in Europe before World War I, and it is from this era that his card collection dates.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: Postcard collection. M0872. Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: A scholar of the Romance languages, particularly Spanish, and professor in the Department of Spanish and Portuguese at U.C. Berkeley.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Morley traveled extensively in Europe before World War I, and it is from this era that his card collection dates.

controlaccess.head: Access Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.

did.unittitle: United States -- Western States (Indians of North America)
